text:
PSALMS AND HYMNS

IN THE LANGUAGE OF

THE CREE INDIANS

OF THE DIOCESE OF

SASKATCHEWAN, NORTH-WEST AMERICA.

COMPILED AND TRANSLATED BY

The Rev. J. A. Mackay, D.D.,
Missionary of the Church Missionary Society, and Archdeacon of Saskatchewan.

PRINTED FOR THE

SOCIETY FOR PROMOTING CHRISTIAN KNOWLEDGE.

London: Northumberland Avenue.

1891
## KEY TO THE CREE SYLLABIC SYSTEM.

### VOWELS

| as in hate | as in pin | as in no | as in pun | as in pan | Final Consonants |
|------------|-----------|----------|-----------|-----------|-----------------|
| ā          | e         | o        | u         | a         |                 |

### Consonants

| W wā ṣ· | we ḍ· | wo ḍ· | wu ḍ· | wa ḍ· |
|---------|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| P pā v· | pe ḷ· | po ḷ· | pu ḷ· | pa ḷ· |
| T tā u· | te ḻ· | to ḻ· | tu ḻ· | ta ḻ· |
| K kā q· | ke ḱ· | ko ḱ· | ku ḱ· | ka ḱ· |
| C cā ṛ· | che ṛ· | cho ṛ· | chu ṛ· | cha ṛ· |
| M mā ṛ· | me ṛ· | mo ṛ· | mu ṛ· | ma ṛ· |
| N nā ṛ· | ne ṛ· | no ṛ· | nu ṛ· | na ṛ· |
| S sā ṛ· | se ṛ· | so ṛ· | su ṛ· | sa ṛ· |
| Y yā ṛ· | ye ṛ· | yo ṛ· | yu ṛ· | ya ṛ· |

### Extra signs

- **X** = Christ, *s* = r, *s* = l, *:wi* = h before a vowel.
- *h* = a soft guttural h when before a consonant.
1. Kākesāpa Nikumoon.

1. Kooskooska ākwa net āchāk
   Ket utoskāwin otina
   Pukitina kitimiwin
   Kākesāpa ayumiha.

2. Tapwā ke nunaskomitin
   Ka ké kunowāyimeyun
   Pitunā ké wuniskayan
   Pimatisewinik isse

3. O! ka Tipāyīchikāyun
   Wāpina ne muchitiwin
   Net āchākōk pukitina
   Meyo mitonāyichikun

4. Ooyāyita ka kesikak
   Kā totuman kā itwāyan
   Eyikoōk ā kuskītayan
   Kitta wē kukwātotuman
5. Mumichimik Kisā Mun’to
   Tūto uskeēk ka aayāyāk
   Keyawaw mena ispimik
   Mumichimik Kisā Mun’to

2. Kākesāpa Nikumoon.

1. Ke kē kunowāyiminan
   Ā mākwa tipiskak
   Kc wē munaskomitinan
   Mena ā wasāyāk

2. Unoōch mena kā kesikak
   Kunowāyiminan
   Chikāma meyo ayawuk
   Ka pimachihutchik

3. Ne ka kukwā nookōtan
   Ā tipāyimiyāk
   Kitta wapūtiyiwayāk
   Kooyusowāwina

4. Ke ka we utooskatinan
   Pāmachihiwayun
   Peyis kitta otitumāk
   Ispimik kesikoōk.
3. Ootakose Nikumoon.

1. Tapwa ke nunaskomitin
   Ā kē wastānumoweyun
   Mamowe kāchayiweyun
   Kāyapich kunowāyimin

2. Ne wunitotumooowina
   Kūkeyow usānumowin
   Kitta kayamāyituman
   Ā utte nuhisineyan

3. Mosuk kiskinohumowin
   Kā isse pimatiseyan
   Āka maka che koostuman
   Nipiwin ootitumanā

4. O! net āchāk kanowāyim
   Kitta kē meyo nipayan
   Mena kā wuniskawanī
   Kitta meyo utooskāyan

5. Āka yiskikwamiyanā
   Kāyapich kunowāyimin
   Piko kākwi ā meywasik
   Kitta mitonāyituman

6. Mumichimik Wāyoota-week
   Mena Jesus Wākoosisēk
   Mena Kunatiseet Āchāk
   Mamowe pāyuk Muneto.
4. Ootakose Nikumoon.

1. Keya Oopimachihiwāo
   Wā pesimomit net āshāk
   Akaweya oma usko
   Ne ka akowastāskakoon

2. Utte yiskikwamiyanā
   Ne ka wē mitonāyitān
   Ā isse meywayitakwūk
   Ke kunowāyimiwāwin

3. Wechāwinan ā kesikak
   Keya ka pimachihiyāk
   Wechāwinan ā tipiskak
   Keya ka uspāyimoyāk

4. Nasinan kooskooskayākā
   Moyās mena utooskayāk
   Peyis kitta ootitumāk
   Meywayimoowin ispimīk

5. Ootakose Nikumoon.

1. Ke kē kunowayiminan
   Oma ka kē kesikak
   Mena kunowayiminan
   Ā utte nahisināk
   Jesus kā pimachiheyāk
   Ke we sakihitinan.
2. Ota ne pimotāhoonan
   Mākwach puspinawinik
   Kūkeyow pimachihinan
   A mumisetotatāk
   Nipiwin otitumākā
   Kitta kē wechāwitāk.

6. Otakose Nikumoon.
1. Wechāwin kisiska ota-
   kosin
   Utte tipiskaw Jesus we-
   chāwin
   Ipse kotukuk nukusit-
   wawa
   Niyatumakāyun pā we-
   chāwin.

2. Māchipayew ne pima-
   tissewin
   Mena uskeewe meywāyi-
   moowin.
   Numa kākwi uskeek
   kāchinatun
   Ka muskowiscyun pa
   wechāwin.

3. Mosuk ke kē kitimakāyimin
   Ā ata kē pā muchayi-
   weyan
   Keya numa wēkach ke
   wāpinin
   Iskwayanik isko pā
   wechāwin.
4. Tūke piko kitta wechāweyun
   Keya ka sakohut muche aya
   Owana kotuk kā kē wechehit
   Piko itta keyam pā wechāwin.

5. Iskwayanik pusukwapiyana
   Keya ka kē nipoostumoweyun
   Towinumowin pimatisewin
   Nipoowinik pā sapo wechāwin.

7. Ā poone ootakose ayumihāk.

1. Oopinachihiwāo, mena kētwam
   Ke mamowe nunaskomitinan
   Ne nepowinan ta nunaskomitāk
   Akwa ta oochicheekwunupeyāk.

2. Meyinan pāyutukāyi-moowin.
   Oma ka we utte kukcewāyak
   Kunowayita muchetewin ōche
   Mitoona ka nunaskomikoyun.
3. Meyinan pāyūtukāyi-moowin
   Oma mena kā utto tipiskak
   Kunowāyimik ket owasi-misuk
   Ā tipiskak mena ā wasāyak.

4. Meyinan pāyūtukāyi-moowin
   Isko uskeēk kāpimatisee-yāk
   Ispe pātumākā ā nutomeyāk
   Keya kitta weche aya-mitāk.

8. Ā ayumihākesikak.

1. Ket utooskāwininowa
   Akwa koyam wāpinūtak
   Jesus ka wētumakoyūk
   Akwa kukwā otinūtak

2. Ke nesōkumakāwina
   Tūke ne ka mumiseenan
   Mosuk ne ka tapwātānan
   Ke kēche sakihiwāwin

3. Pitunā kē wapūtuman
   Unoōch ke sakihiwāwin
   Kūkeyow nc muchitiwin
   Ā poonāyitumoweyun
9. Advent Nikumoon.

1. Cheest! pâche nookosew wuskôk
   Ka kë nipoostumakât
   Michât ookunachihoowa
   Pa wechâwâo usiche
   Mumichimik
   Mumichimik, ma,
   Amen.

2. Kûkeyow kunowapumik
   Kichayiwin kikiskum
   Tûto ka muchâyimachik
   Ka kë cheestahaskwatachik
   Sakisisiwuk
   Këtwam a wapumachik.

3. Ministikwa wenipâkwa
   Kesik numa ta tukwun
   Tûto ka kë pukwatachik
   Pâtumwuk pootachikun
   Astumitik
   Kooyusowatikowaw.

4. Pimachihoowin ka pâtûk
   Wapûtumook a nookwûk
   Kûkeyow pâmachihîchik
Kitta nukiskwāwuk
Mumichimik
Muneto ta nookosow.

10. Christmas Nikumoon.
1. Ma! Angeluk nikumowuk
   Ā kē nookosit Jesus.
   Muneto mena eyinew
   Oototāmimitoowuk

2. Mumūtakosik ākwa
   Kūkeyow eyinetik
   Wechihikwaw kesikōk
   Ka ōche nikumochik

3. Nukutum kiche kesik
   Kitta pimachiliwāt
   Tukosin eyinewa
   Kētwam ta wuniskanat

4. Astum maka wechāwi-
   nan
   Ka usowapumitāk
   Nipūta ne tāhināk
   Kūkeyow muchētewin.
11. Christmas Nikumoon.

1. How! Ootayumihawuk kooskooskak Utumiskumook kiche kesikaw Pāmachihiwātka kē nookosit Mamuskach sakihiwāwin ōcho Angeluk nekan ka atotūkik Muneto uskečk ā pā nookosit.

2. Akwa ookunowimayutikwāwuk Pātumwuk meyo achi-moowin A itichik ke pātwatina-waw Mena kūkeyow ayiseyinew Kiche mena meyo achi-moowin Unoōch pamachihiwāt nookosew.

3. How! Mamitonāyitūtan keyam Muneto oo kisāwatise-win Naspieh ā wē pimachi-hikoyūk.
How! Kukwa kiskinow-apumatak
Mena tapwā pinitisā-watak
Koo Pimachihiwāminow Jesus.

4. Akose ke ka uspāyimow.
Kitta wechihayūkok angeluk
Ā nikumooostowachik Jesus-a
Wapumayūko kiche kosikōk
Ke ka mumichimanow kakekā
Ke kiche okimaminow Jesus.

12. Christmas Nikumowin.

1. Pā itōtāk kūkeyow te-apwāntumāk
Pā wapumik oopimachihiwāo
Ayiseyinēk kē isse nitawikew
Ākwa mumichimatāk
Jesus Christ.

2. Tapwā Muneto tapwā Munetōk āche
Āka ka atowāyimikoyūk
Ké nookosew kitta pimachihikoyük
Ākwa mumichimatāk
Jesus Christ.

3. Nikumook keyawaw oopimachihooonuk
Mena angeluk kiche kesikoök
Mumichimik mawuch āspāyitakosit
Ākwa mumichimatāk
Jesus Christ.

4. Mamowe nikumooostowatak Jesus
Mamowe ka tipāyimikoyük
Ayiseyinēk ké isse nitawikew
Ākwa mumichimatāk
Jesus Christ.

13. Lent Nikumoon.

1. Net ūchāk kisewak nata
Oo kiche upiwin
Itta Jesus ā nutōtūk
Ayumihawina.
2. Jesus kel ayumiwinik
   Tapwā ke kē itwan
   Oowunihoo ne nutomaw
   Āko towa neya.

3. Nunākatāyimooyanā
   Muchētiwin ḍche
   Mena wuwanāyituman
   Meyin aywāpiwin

4. Natumowin mena kasin
   Ayimunōk ḍche
   O! Nootinikāstumowin
   Ayimiseyane.

5. Mamuskach sakihiwāwin
   Ka wapūtiyuchik
   Kitimake wunitiskuk
   Ka pimachihuchik.

14. Lent Nikumoon.

1. Wechihinan O Muneto
   Tūtwaw ā kesikak
   Mena tūto tipulhikun
   Kā pimatiseyak.

2. Wechihinan muchētiwin
   A noochihikoyāk
15. Good Friday Nikumoon.

1. Kākunowapútumwuke
   Itta ka ke chestaskwatit
   Net usānān tūto kākwi
   Ayiwak net itāyitā.

2. Numa kākwi ne mumiseen
   Christ piko ka pimachihit
   Tūto ka kē sakītayan
   Ne ka pukitinumowaw

3. Cheest! oo stikwanik
   oo chichechik
   Kē ootasikowuneyew
   Oò miko ā puskiyakāt
   Aspéche kisāwatiseet.
4. Kukiyow kakwi nayayu
Pukitimumowuk maka
Kitta nootapayiyepun
Aspeche kis-awatisceet.

16. Good Friday Nikumoon.

1. Muskach tapwa ke mikowew
Noopimachihiwam
Neya oche munichosik
Assenakoseyan.

2. Ne muchatisewina che
Ka ke nipuhikoot
Muskach kissawatiscewin
Tapwa issa mis-aw

3. Tasipwa pesim ke kasoot
Muneto napuhit
Ayiseyinewa oche
A muchatiseyit.

4. Ne ka nunapawihikoon
Ne muchitiwina
A mamitonayituman
Ka ke totumowit.
5. Maka numoweya ne ka
   Kê tipuhän tapwâ
   Akwa ne pukitinisonoon
   O Jesus otinin!

17. Ā Apisisinoowe Kesikak.

1. Jesus Christ kē wuniskaw
   Akwa meyuwatumook
   Kesikoök ka ayayāk
   Mena kūkeyow uskeēk.

2. Cheest! assi kē wuniskaw
   Nipiwin sakochitaw.
   Cheest! assi kē oopiskaw
   Sakōtaw yikwuhuskan

3. Akwa ka muchitiyak
   Asootumakowiyāk
   Kitta ootootāmiyāk
   Ka pimachihikoyāk.

4. Jesus unōch wuniskaw
   Akwa meyuwatumook
   Kiseewāk mumichimik
   Una ka puskiyakāt.
18. Ā Apisisinoowe Kesikak.

1. Kistāyitakwun kākisāp
   Christ ka kē wuniskat
   Kē sakoochitaw nipiwin
   Mena yikwuhuskan

2. Tapwā noōtāpuyew ata
   Muskowisemukūk
   Che michiminikoot Jesus
   Aka che wuniskat

3. Tapwā ne mumichitānan
   Ke wēyowin Jesus
   Unoōch ta nikumooostowaw
   Kāche natumakāt

4. Kuskītaw tapwā mitone
   Nāpoostumakoyūk
   Kitta mumichimit uskeēk
   Ussiche kesikoōk

5. Keyam mumichimatanik
   Nunaskomatanik
   Wāyōtaweek Wākoosisōk
   Mena Meyo ‘Uchāk
19. 'Opiskawe Kosikaw.

1. Assi itôtāo Jesus Christ
Ispimik kiche kesikoôk

Poone wuwesukâyitum *
Numa mena kitta nipew
Kakekā ta pimatisew
Mena ké usootumakāo
Kûkeyow ta pimachihat
Unihe kâ tapwâtakoot

2. Ke kiche okimaminow
Una ka nipoostumatûk
Ke kunowâyimikonow
Ket ayumestumakonow
Ke ka wapûteyikonow
Kiche kesikoôk mâskunow
Ke kitimakinakonow
Ke wê pimachihikonow

3. How! Kitta wê pâtakwunwa
Ke nikumooowininowa.
Ta mumichimayûk una
Kiche kesikoôk ka upit
Ka sakowchitat nipiwin
Kûkeyow ka tipâyîtûk
Ka paskîtânnumakoyûk
Iskwâtâm kîche kesikoôk
20. Wapiskawe Ayumihākesikaw.

1. Koo Pimachihiwāminow Moyās nukutitūk Kāskinōtuhiwāt ke kē Meyikonow.

2. Ke pā yāyātotakonow Oo kunachihooowin Tupūtāyimoowin ā we Meyikoyūk

3. Weya ūchāk ka pātowūk Pākach ā ayumit Kuyamitāhāwin ā we Meyikoyūk

4. Ayiwāk kāskītayūko Kitta sakōtwayūk Weya kunache Āchāk ka Meyikoyūk

5. Kissāwatisewe Āchāk Kisseeppākininan Kūkeyow kunatiseewin Pā meyinan
21. Kissā Muneto oma che
Ke kunache issétwawin
Keyam ta pā mechesowuk
Kūkeyow ket eyinemuk.

2. Tapwā che ke kwayatustan
Kunachemekisiyakun
Keyam ta pā minikwāwuk
Kūkeyow ket eyinemuk.

3. Kunatāyitakwuneyew
Christ oo tipiskinākwawin
Tapwā sowayitakosew
Una māyo ukitumāt.

4. O keyam sakuskīnuhik
Tapwā mamūtakosewin
Pimachihik sowāyimik
Ket eyinemuk O Jesus

5. Keyam eyinumowinan
Tapwā che tipitotumāk
Kitta ké pākatiseyāk
Mena che meyoskakoyāk
22. Kîche Issétwawin.

1. O ka Tipâyîchikâyun
   Ne we kunokiskisinan
   Ka isse sakihiwâyun
   Köche nipoostumoweyâk

2. Ke miko ka sekimumun
   Ne ka wo pâkihîkonan
   Kitta ukwunuhookoyâk
   Ke kwayuskitatisewin

3. Ka ké kukwatukîtayun
   Ne tâhinana pâkita
   Muchêtiwin ka kosikwûk
   Kûkeyow mena otina

4. Àkaweya ka mayatûk
   Ne ka tipâyimikonan
   Ne tâhinâk pukitina
   Ke meywâyimohiwiwâwin

---

23. Kîche Issétwawin.

1. Ka ké isse sékimeyun
   A tupûtayimisoyan
   Ne wé kukwâ tipitotân
   Kitta kiskisitotatan.
2. Koyow ka kē pokonumik
   Ne ka wē apuchihikoon
   Oma mena minikwakun
   Kitta kiskisitotatan

3. A mamitonāyituman
   Ka kē nipoostumoweyun
   Jesus noo Pimachibiwām
   Ke wē kiskisitotatin

4. A āskwa pimatiseyan
   Ne ka we tapwā moosītan
   Ke kiche sakihiwāwin
   Kitta kiskisitotatan

5. Ispe maka natumanā
   Itta kitta nukutuman
   Kūkeyow uskēk ka ayak
   Akwa kiskisetotowin

24. Seekahūtakāwin.

1. Kitta utooskowut una
   Ka kē nipoostumask
   Ket isse otinitinan
   Oma nipee ōche
2. Ḋka ta sakwāyimoyun  
   Christ kitta wechāwut  
   Ta nootinikāstumowut  
   Ḋka ā nukeyun

3. Kitta mitimāwut mena  
   Weya oo maskunow  
   Kitta isso otinumun  
   Ka isso otinūk

4. A kiskinowachihitāk  
   Kitta tipāyimisk  
   Pitunā tapwā wechāwut  
   Meywāyimoowinik

25. Sekahūtakāwin.

1. Kitimakinakāo  
   Oopimachihiwāo  
   Āpoōchika owasisa  
   Kisāwatotowāo

2. Askwa uskeēk ayat  
   Oo ké tūkonāti  
   Ké kīche meyo totowāō  
   Ā ké sowayimat

3. O keyam otinik  
   Tūto ka pāsēchik  
   Tapwā meyo itukimik  
   Pimachibik mena
4. Ne pāsiwananuk
   Upistowasisuk
   O Christ kicho sowāyimik
   Pimachihik mena

26. Kuyūtā Ayiseyinew ā Sekuhūtat.

1. Ota mosuk ne wē ayan
   Kisiwak āayayun
   Net uspāyiimoowin oma
   Jesus ā kē nipit

2. Noo Pimachihiwām Je-
   Mena ne Munetom [sus
   Kisepākinin ke mikoōk
   Muchētiwin ōche

3. Pākihin ta ayawiyun
   Mena ta ayatan
   Pākihin missewā neyow
   Mena net āchākoōk

4. Ke mik kāskitumakoyan
   Ne ka tapwā ayan.
   Ākose wechihin tapwā
   Kitta sakihitān
27. Ayeechihitowin.

1. Kitta mumichimawakwa
   Ke munetomenow
   Oma kiche issétwawin
   A wapúteyitúk

2. Ka ké usotumakayúk
   Mitonáyítútak
   Kitta we ayeechitayúk
   Káchiwak keyanow

3. Muche isséchikáwina
   Kitta wápinumúk
   Muche ukawatumooowin
   Kitta anwátumúk

4. Missewá ayumihawin
   Kitta tapwátumúk
   Missewá pimatissewin
   Kitta we ayayúk

5. Michiminumwatan weya
   Ooyusowáwina
   Wé totumwatan eyikoók
   Ká pimatiseyúk
28. Ḍ Nuhinlchik Oonipiwuk.

1. Tanāk ka mowikatūkok
   Ke totāminowuk
   Jesus ka kē pā nutomat
   Kitta weehāwikoot

2. Tanāke mena nipiwin
   Ka sākihikoyūk
   Āwukwāyow oma Jesus
   Oo nutōkamooowin

3. Tanāk mena yikwuhuskan
   Ka sākihikoyūk
   Ako toowik weyow Jesus
   Ka kē nuhinumooōt

4. Akota kē ḍche puspeew
   Mena ā wuniskat
   Ke kē nekanōtakonow
   Ispimik kesikōk

5. Keyam maka ta pātakwun
   Kāseewāk pipikwun
   Kooskooskak utamik uskeēk
   Keyawaw āyayāk
29. Ḁ Nuhinłchik Oonipiwuk.

1. Ma! Tanātachik kesikoök
   Ka meyo nipiyit
   Naspich moyonikatawuk
   A meyo nipiyit

2. Jesus ā utte nipāhat
   Meyo ayayiwa
   Kūkoyowmuche kākwaya
   A nukutumeyit

3. Kūkeyow ayimisceewin
   Ota nukutumwuk
   Munetowa ā natachik
   Che utoskowachik

30. Ḁ Nuhinłchik Oonipiwuk.

1. A wapūtumūk nipiwin
   Māte kukwāchimisotak
   Neyache ne kwayatiseen
   Kitta nukutuman uske

2. Ispe oma ne yāyāwin
   Ka isse tapwā nāsowūk
   Utte kipichipayika
   Nipiwin ne ka otitān
3. Ne ka nukutan kükoyow
Ota ka kd sakitayan
Kitta otiskowiskowuk
Una ka oyusowasit

4. Ne ka che maka pátowaw
Kitta isit owusitā
Muche āckākwuk wechāwik
Nunākatāyimoowinik

5. Nowuch itítowuk astum
Ka sowāyitakoseyun
Aya ispimik kesikōk
Kakekā meywāyimoowin

31. Ā Poone Kukāskima-wusoōk.

1. Tapwāwin ka kd pátumāk
Kaskinohumakoweyāk
Ne tāhenāk ta we ustāo
Net āchākcnāk ussiche

2. Āsse miskowasomiwāk
Oma kunache itwāwin
Pitunā kd wechākoyūk
Peyis ispimik kesikoōk
32. Owasise Nikumoon.

1. Cheest! meywayimowin
   Wayow uskeek
   Ookumatisewuk
   A ayachik
   Ma! ka nikumochik
   A meytakosichik
   Oo Pimachihiwao
   Mumichimaw

2. Pa natumook oma
   Meyo uske
   Tanak ka ayayak
   A pahoyak
   Akota ka ayak
   Tapwa meywayimooowin
   Ka Tipayichikat
   A wechawuk

3. Kukeyow akota
   Ka ayachik
   Kunowayimikwuk
   Kotawenow
   Chkeestutak maka
   Kitta ke otitumuk
   Ispimik ka ayak
   Kichayiwin
33. Owasisc Nikumoon

1. Pitunā kē wechāwukik
   Ispimik angeluk
   Nesta kitta issehoyan
